title: Add support for rand_like op in fusion compiler
body_html: Enabled support for generating random numbers in fusion compiler. Currently a philox RNG implemented by Tensorflow is used, as the NVRTC couldn't resolve the curand.h header correctly. The two implementation should have exact same behavior according to our tests.
body_text: Enabled support for generating random numbers in fusion compiler. Currently a philox RNG implemented by Tensorflow is used, as the NVRTC couldn't resolve the curand.h header correctly. The two implementation should have exact same behavior according to our tests.
